abstract: Some of the biggest names in American retailing, including Macy’s, Home Depot and Target, reported steep profit declines.
snippet: Some of the biggest names in American retailing, including Macy’s, Home Depot and Target, reported steep profit declines.
lead_paragraph: For years, the nation’s retailers could throw up new stores and shoppers would pour through the doors. Now, in bleaker times, the chains are having to work for the public’s business, and some are doing it better than others.

headline.print_headline: Some Retailers Hang Tough Despite Weak Profits
